LanguageData.JRWPachyrhinosaurus.label: Pachyrhinosaurus
LanguageData.JRWPachyrhinosaurus.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #03453-1950 [PACHYRHINOSAURUS CANADENSIS] CODENAME: THICK-NOSE >4721
A centrosaurine ceratopsid with a thick, chubby nose and an intricate display frill. Fossil sites discovered prove that these dinosaurs looked after their young as a herd.
LanguageData.JRWPachyrhinosaurus.tools.horn-0.label: horn
LanguageData.JRWPachyrhinosaurus.tools.horn-1.label: horn
LanguageData.JRWPachyrhinosaurus.tools.head.label: head
